title: High ping for people with Rogers
body: Anyone else with Rogers (GTA) been having ping issues with their ping sitting at 150-200 all game? Not spiking but consistent ping. I did everything from restart router to change computer settings to optimize ping but nothing has been working. Thinking it might be Rogers issue but was wondering if anyone is having similar problems.

replies.body: I've been seeing quite a few of these Roger's ISP issues recently, and I believe out techs are currently in talks trying to figure out what's going wrong. If you wouldn't mind, run a quick traceroute using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and post the results back here, or go ahead and shoot those over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
i just left a game because of this, and ima consider switching to bell. This shit happened wayy too much
Same maybe they will investigate. I got two other teammates who had the same thing.
